item.title: Need boolean REP++
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

found: server.model.npcs.NPC;
required: boolean

the bit in bold is where the error is pointing to.

				case 100010:

if(c.summoned) {
c.summoned.isDead = true;
c.summoned.applyDead = true;
c.summoned.actionTimer = 0;
c.summoned.npcType = -1;
c.summoned.updateRequired = true;
c.summoned = null;
c.sendMessage(“dismissed familiar.”);
}
break;
